      public void init() throws IOException
      Initialize the model by getting the number of records in the database and calls getData()
      Throws:
      IOException - If the file is missing

    • getData

      public void getData() throws IOException
      Reads and stores the records in the database on the Workers array
      Throws:
      IOException - If there was an error reading from the data base

    • writeData

      public void writeData() throws IOException
      Writes the records stored in the Workers array on the database
      Throws:
      IOException - If the file is missing

    • create

      public void create(Worker worker)
      Adds the record sent to the Workers array

      worker - Workers data

    • read

      public Worker read(int id)
      Searches for the id sent and reads it if exists
      Parameters:
      id - Id of the worker
      Returns:
      the worker with the id sent

    • delete

      public void delete(int id)
      Deletes the worker with the id sent on the Workers array
      Parameters:
      id - Id of the worker

    • update

      public void update(int id, Worker worker)
      Updates the data of the worker with the id sent with the new data sent
      Parameters:
      id - Id of the worker
      worker - Worker with the new data

    • search

      public boolean search(int id)
      Searches for the id sent
      Parameters:
      id - Id of the worker
      Returns:
      true if the id is on the database and false otherwise

      Search for the smallest available id
